column4: im back!  and guess what... turning on that driver (ATI restricted) worked like a charm!!!!!!!   thank you guys very much
lol
i have one more small problem... at the login screen, the very first letter i press is lost... for example, to login as "ananonymouskiller" i have to press the a twice!  "aananonymouskiller"!!!
anyone seen anything like that before?
